hero.name: Marina
hero.title: Senior SAP Consultant
hero.subtitle: Integration Solutions & Automation Specialist
hero.description: Designing and implementing comprehensive integration solutions for enterprise systems. Expertise in process engineering, test automation, and database optimization.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Strategic Expertise
about.description:
Lead SAP ERP/BI consultant in enterprise integration and automation with extensive experience in high-load retail landscapes.

I take full responsibility for the end-to-end solution lifecycle: from gathering and structuring business requirements, systems analysis, and prototyping to estimation, planning, development of integrations and services, all types of testing (functional, integration, regression, performance), deployment, and production rollout.

My focus is on reliable and scalable integration solutions between SAP ERP, the POS landscape, and external systems: REST/SOAP APIs, message queues, IDoc, bgRFC, and event-driven approaches. I design asynchronous data flows with a focus on fault tolerance, data integrity, performance, and real-world operational scenarios.
about.description2:
My core strength lies in systems thinking and engineering discipline. I build solution architectures from requirements to production: modeling target processes and interactions (BPMN, EPC, IDEF0/IDEF3), creating architectural and technical specifications, evaluating alternatives and constraints, and ensuring transparent documentation (Confluence, Swagger/OpenAPI).

I place significant emphasis on quality and reproducibility: test automation, advanced Postman (collections, JavaScript-based auto-tests, monitors), CI/CD, monitoring, and alerting. I excel at bringing solutions to a production-ready state, including the optimization of performance, data, and integration processes.

In addition to enterprise projects, I develop practical web services and Telegram bots — ranging from rapid MVPs to integration services tailored to specific business processes, enabling quick hypothesis testing and reduced time-to-market.
about.description3: Systems analysis is a key competency: I have the ability to listen to the business, formalize requirements, define the target state, and guide implementation through to stable production operation.

integration.title: Comprehensive Integration Solutions
integration.description: Designing and implementing enterprise integrations between heterogeneous systems. Applying modern integration patterns: Event-Driven Architecture, API Gateway, Message Queue, Circuit Breaker. Working with ABAP for POSDW, BGRFC, IDOC interfaces (WPUTAB, WPUUMS, WBBDLD). Ensuring reliability and scalability of solutions.

processes.title: Process Engineering
processes.description: Developing and implementing development, testing, and monitoring processes. Configuring CI/CD pipelines, monitoring systems and alerting, Git infrastructure in corporate environments. Systematic approach to workflow optimization.

automation.title: Test Automation
automation.description: Developing U.T.A. (Unseen Test Agent) platform for unifying testing lifecycle. Creating comprehensive test suites and automated processes. Integration with CI/CD for continuous testing.

databases.title: Database Expertise
databases.description: Designing and optimizing databases: SAP HANA, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB. Developing efficient data schemas, optimizing complex SQL queries, configuring indexes, designing ETL processes. Selecting optimal solutions for specific requirements.

refactoring.title: Business Process Refactoring
refactoring.description: Comprehensive refactoring of critical business processes: optimizing POS frontend interactions, refactoring order fulfillment and returns processes, optimizing cache data with migration to asynchronous services (BGRFC), enhancing aggregation processes. Improving system performance and reliability.

performance.title: Performance and Optimization
performance.description: Designing systems with focus on performance. Developing solution for circular data reconciliation between POS servers and SAP ERP: transitioning from multi-day processes to real-time synchronization. Designing asynchronous services based on BGRFC, optimizing queries and processes for handling large data volumes.

responsibilities: Designed solution concept for implementing microservice for production order management as part of the project

Led functional and integration testing of projects
